Name: Salamina Town
Description: The main town of the island, known for its bustling port and historical landmarks.

Name: Peristeria
Description: A residential and agricultural area on the island, with a calm atmosphere and green spaces.

Name: Kaminia
Description: A coastal area with a mix of local industry, fishing villages, and scenic beaches.

Name: Aianteio
Description: A historic site known for its ancient ruins and proximity to natural parks and beaches.
